sentences.en: And further more, investigations the promotion of urbanism to adjustment of industrial structure.
sentences.cn: 又从拉力和载体两个方面考察了城市化过程对产业结构调整的促进作用.

sentences.en: Due to its size, the project is about both urbanism and architecture.
sentences.cn: 由于其规模, 该项目是两个城市建筑.

sentences.en: I don’t read the language here in Beijing, but it is indeed beautiful. If only I didn’t know anything about architecture and urbanism.
sentences.cn: 我不懂北京的语言，但它确实很美，只要我不懂建筑和都市生活。

sentences.en: Loneliness could be the right characteristic of the living circumstances of the urbanism writers in 1930 s.
sentences.cn: 孤独,可以说是对1930年代中国现代都会主义作家生存境遇的最好概括.

sentences.en: There is no magic formula explaining our attraction to architecture, construction, destruction, cultures and urbanism.
sentences.cn: 没有魔法公式能够解释建筑物、建筑、毁坏、文化和都市生活对我们的吸引力。

sentences.en: This subject engages a dialogue with architecture and urbanism from the perspective of the visual artist.
sentences.cn: 这个科目藉由视觉艺术家的观点来接合建筑与都市生活的对话.

sentences.en: This whole journal edition is devoted to New Urbanism, with a number of case studies.
sentences.cn: 这本期刊全部内容刊载关于新都市主义的文章, 并有许多个案研究.

trans.tran_cn: 都市生活，都市社会物质需求的研究，都市化
